Pilot Fiber | Frontend Software Engineer | NYC | ONSITE

https://pilotfiber.com

At Pilot, we're building the best ISP in the world. As our first frontend-focused engineer, you'll be building new experiences for our customers as well as internal tools that help us automate our network, manage our massive construction operation (yes, we lay our own fiber!), and more.

You'll be joining a small team, and as such you'll be contributing to the overall direction of our technology and how we develop software here at Pilot. There's plenty of room for innovation and experimentation!

To apply, email andrew @ the domain above.
